Package com.berthoud.project3oc.menu

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berthoud.project3oc.menu.Main
  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    This program implements two guessing games: Game 1 (+/-) and Game 2 (Mastermind). Each game can be played in 3 modes challenger, defender and duel. For more details on the specific games:
    See Also:
    Games, Game1, Game2, GameModeDuel, Game1ModeChallenger, Game1ModeDefender, Game2ModeChallenger, Game2ModeDefender

      • devMode

        private static boolean devMode
        All games can be executed in a mode developer, in which the code to be found is displayed. It makes possible to check if everything works properly. This mode can be activated through the config properties file or by entering the parameter "dev" in the command line

      • choiceGame

        private static java.lang.String choiceGame

      • choiceMode

        private static java.lang.String choiceMode

      • isDevMode

        public static boolean isDevMode()

      • getChoiceGame

        public static java.lang.String getChoiceGame()

      • getChoiceMode

        public static java.lang.String getChoiceMode()

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method loads the configuration parameters from the config.properties file and calls the menu
        Parameters:
        args - takes the argument "dev" to launch the developer mode from the command line. The developer mode can also be activated through the config.properties file.

      • menu

        public static void menu()
        The method implements the menu, which makes possible for the user to select a game and a mode.

      • startTheGame

        public static void startTheGame​(java.lang.String choiceGame,
                                java.lang.String choiceMode)
        The method instantiate a game-instance, according to the selection game/mode made by the player and start the game through the method Games.play().
        Parameters:
        choiceGame - Game 1 (+/-) or 2 (Digit Mastermind)
        choiceMode - Mode challenger, defender or duel

      • loadConfig

        private static void loadConfig()
        This method loads the config file
